cards.name: Choice Band
text: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon-GX or Active Pokémon-EX (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Energy Loto
text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Energy card you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Energy Recycler
text: Shuffle 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Enhanced Hammer
text: Discard a Special Energy from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Field Blower
text: Choose up to 2 in any combination of Pokémon Tool cards and Stadium cards in play (yours or your opponent's) and discard them.

cards.name: Hala
text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. If you have used your GX attack, draw 7 cards. If not, draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Mallow
text: Search your deck for 2 cards, shuffle your deck, then put those cards on top of it in any order.

cards.name: Max Potion
text: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, discard all Energy from that Pokémon.

cards.name: Multi Switch
text: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Rescue Stretcher
text: Choose 1: •Put a Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand. •Shuffle 3 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck.

attacks.name: Muddy Acid
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flickering Flames
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Pollen Hazard
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Stick and Absorb
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Petal Blizzard
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads. This Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 30 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

attacks.name: Horn Leech
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scamper Away
attacks.text: Shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

ability.name: Armor
ability.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Resolute Claws
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-GX or a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Victory Star
ability.text: Once during your turn, after you flip any coins for an attack, you may ignore all results of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again. You can't use more than 1 Victory Star Ability each turn.

ability.name: Shady Move
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Passionate Dance
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Fire Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.

ability.name: Hot Poison
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Turtonator-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Shell Trap
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nitro Tank-GX
attacks.text: Attach 5 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Slush Rush
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Beacon
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hyper Jump

attacks.name: All the Presents
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Dive
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Fighting Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: You may discard 2 Water Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Borne Ashore
attacks.text: Put a Basic Pokémon from either player’s discard pile onto its owner’s Bench.

ability.name: Schooling
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch this Pokémon with a Wishiwashi-GX in your hand. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

cards.name: Tapu Koko-GX

ability.name: Aero Trail
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may move any number of Lightning Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Copycat

ability.text: Your opponent can’t have more than 4 Benched Pokémon. If they have 5 or more Benched Pokémon, they discard Benched Pokémon until they have 4 Pokémon on the Bench. If more than one effect changes the number of Benched Pokémon allowed, use the smaller number.
